text: hamane raat aur din ko do nishaaniyaan banaee hai. phir raat kee nishaanee ko hamane mitee huee (prakaashaheen) banaaya aur din kee nishaanee ko hamane prakaashamaan banaaya, taaki tum apane rab ka anugrah (rozee) dhoondho aur taaki tum varsho kee ganana aur hisaab maaloom kar sako, aur har cheez ko hamane alag-alag spasht kar rakha hai
